board.text: Ember Twin activity: Touch a cactus
Ember Twin activity: Make Chert panic

board.tooltip: Must stand inside one of the houses.
board.text: Reach The Hanging City: Eye Shrine District on Brittle Hollow

board.tooltip: Use the Quantum Moon Locator to observe the Moon.
board.text: Ember Twin activity: Locate the Moon around Timber Hearth, The Ember Twin and Brittle Hollow

board.tooltip: The central room with the tree.
board.text: Reach The Hanging City: School District on Brittle Hollow

board.tooltip: Must happen in a single loop in that order, but detours are allowed.
board.text: Travel from Gabbro's Island to Bramble Island

board.tooltip: You cannot get credit for the same ship twice.
board.text: Touch 3 travelers' ships

board.tooltip: The reservoir under the bridge to the Nomai Mines at the bottom of the large Geyser Mountain.
board.text: Reach The First Encounter Mural on Timber Hearth

board.tooltip: Must be inside the dome.
board.text: Reach Southern Observatory on Brittle Hollow

board.tooltip: You cannot get credit for the same location twice.
board.text: Touch 3 Quantum Shards
Reach Bramble Island on Giant's Deep
Use oxigen as propellant
Ember Twin activity: Watch the anglerfish skeleton from the Crashsite Caves
Ember Twin activity: Enter the Sunless City via the Escape Pod
Ember Twin activity: Use a bridge to cross the huge gap carved by the sand.
Ash Twin activity: Touch the core material from the outside

board.tooltip: Must be standing inside the tower.
board.text: Reach The Brittle Hollow Tower on Ash Twin

board.tooltip: Time difference must be visible to the naked eye.
board.text: Ember Twin activity: Perform the experiment in the High Energy Lab

board.tooltip: Simply being down there is enough, no need to enter the cave.
board.text: Reach The Lakebed Cave on Ember Twin

board.tooltip: You cannot get credit for the same planet twice.
board.text: Translate text on 3 bodies

board.tooltip: The crater containing the Bramble Seed.
board.text: Reach Youngbark Crater on Timber Hearth

board.tooltip: Large mountains scattered around Timber Hearth that periodically spout water columns from their geyser peaks.
board.text: Reach The Geyser Mountains on Timber Hearth

board.tooltip: The intact module.
board.text: Translate any text at Orbital Probe Cannon: Control Module

board.tooltip: You don't have to take the core out of the casing.
board.text: Ash Twin activity: Turn off the gravity and open the casing.

board.tooltip: Open and enter the mining site inside the huge Geyser Mountain.
board.text: Reach The Mining Site 2b on Timber Hearth

board.tooltip: The module with the fractured window.
board.text: Reach Orbital Probe Cannon: Launch Module on Giant's Deep

board.tooltip: The Gravity Cannon on Brittle Hollow.
board.text: Use a projection pool at The Brittle Hollow Gravity Cannon

board.tooltip: Traverse the cave system to arrive at the quatum shard.
board.text: Reach The Lakebed Cave Quantum Shard on Ember Twin

board.tooltip: Damaged or not, it must be standing on the surface.
board.text: Land your ship on The Stranger

board.tooltip: The building must be entered and the ghost matter pit crossed.
board.text: Reach The Sunless City: Eye Shrine District on Ember Twin
